page.title: 13THE FOOD WE EAT.
page.content: We have three main meals a day, breakfast, dinner and tea. Breakfast would usually be cereal. Some people have toast or a cooked breakfast. Dinner would be potatoes, meat and vegetables and a pudding. Puddings are tinned fruit such as peaches, manderin oranges and pears, or can be things with custard. Sometimes we have ice cream or jelly. Tea can be a cooked meal like beans on toast or salad or sandwiches.For special occasions people would go to a restaurant.Most people buy their bread and cakes rather than bake their own. They buy their food from a supermarket and will buy a weeks food at a time.Food that is not in tins or packets is kept in the fridge or freezer.Most people buy their vegetables instead of growing them.
